homepage.fastShippingDesc: Delivery within 24-48 hours to major cities
homepage.qualityGuaranteeDesc: All parts guaranteed with clear return policy
homepage.supportDesc: Support team available 24/7 to help you
homepage.needHelpDesc: Our team is ready to assist you with any inquiries

customerDashboard.heroSubtitle: Unified system for ordering and pricing Chinese auto parts for wholesale customers, insurance companies, rental companies, and parts stores.
customerDashboard.searchTip: Best results when searching by part number
customerDashboard.pressSearch: Press search button for exact search:
customerDashboard.outOfStockMessage: This part is currently out of stock
customerDashboard.addToCartTip: Click (Price) to view details and add product
customerDashboard.partsStoresDesc: Organize wholesale orders, manage quotes, and track each order status accurately.
customerDashboard.insuranceDesc: Unified platform for parts requests for accident cases and official approvals management.
customerDashboard.rentalDesc: Prepare parts for vehicle fleets with complete records of previous orders.
customerDashboard.salesRepsDesc: Tool for organizing customer orders you manage in different regions and cities.
customerDashboard.quoteRequestsDesc: Upload your items file and get a complete quote for available and unavailable items in seconds.
customerDashboard.importFromChinaDesc: Custom form for import requests, with our import/export company in three Chinese cities.
customerDashboard.wholesaleOrdersDesc: Complete record for each order, with order status, invoice printing, and PDF download.
customerDashboard.staffBranchesDesc: Add staff to your account, set their permissions, and link orders to each branch or rep.
customerDashboard.step1Desc: Submit an account request via a form customized for your business type.
customerDashboard.step2Desc: We review your data and grant you search and wholesale ordering permissions.
customerDashboard.step3Desc: Use smart search by part number or upload Excel files.
customerDashboard.step4Desc: We contact you to complete orders and shipping or special import.
customerDashboard.expertiseDesc: Specialists in Chinese auto parts only, ensuring part accuracy.
customerDashboard.techDesc: Direct link with inventory and accounting system for instant updates.
customerDashboard.globalDesc: Private import/export offices in 3 major Chinese cities.
customerDashboard.supportDesc: Dedicated wholesale sales team available all week.
customerDashboard.fastShippingDesc: 24-hour delivery to major cities and refrigerated shipping to remote areas.
customerDashboard.techSupportDesc: Dedicated wholesale sales team available all week.
customerDashboard.enterValidPartNumber: Please enter a valid part number.
customerDashboard.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

adminSettings.minVisibleQtyNote: Products with quantity below this will not be visible to customers (Default: 1)
adminSettings.stockThresholdNote: Products with quantity at or below this will show as 'Out of Stock' (Default: 0)

adminSettings.defaultStatusInfoDesc: Used when creating new records. You can set any status as default via the star icon.
adminSettings.guestModeSettingsDesc: Control what unregistered visitors see when browsing the site. You can enable/disable different sections and adjust blur intensity.
